cause.description:
The Migraine Research Foundation raises funds for innovative scientific research into the causes and treatment of migraine.
For more information, visit www.migraineresearchfoundation.org
1. MRF is the only organization whose sole purpose is to raise funds for migraine research.
2. MRF is working to alleviate the suffering caused by this disabling disease.
3. Migraine affects 1 in 4 families in the US alone: There are 36 million sufferers, 14 million of whom suffer on a near daily basis!
4. Women suffer at a rate 3 times that of men.
5. 10% of school-age kids suffer; many show their first symptoms as infants!
cause.mission: MRF raises funds for innovative scientific research to further the understanding of the causes and mechanisms of migraine, to develop improved treatments for sufferers, and to find the cure.
cause.name: Migraine Research Foundation
